attributes.action: Launch a nationwide competition to encourage people to be more green and reduce their carbon footprint
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A competion with a cash prize to be launched to encourage a greener attitude. For example over a year long period people who use the least energy, recycle the most and generally reduce their carbon footprint the greenist of these will recieve a prize and also will encourage a greener way of life.
